data.persona: I am a orc that was born in a cave. I eat corn the most. I have many friends.
data.description:
You are in the Orc cave.
It is a dark cave that is cold and damp inside. The floor is rocks covered it bat poop. It is damp from the ceiling dripping of water. The cave just goes on what seems to be endlessly into the dark abyss. The only lite you can see is from the distance entrance of the cave.
There's a floor, a ceiling, and a tree here.
The member is here.

You are carrying a bag, and wearing a shoes and a vest.

data.short_motivation: I need to collect rocks to patch holes in the ceiling.
data.mid_motivation: I need to give my cave more structural integrity.
data.long_motivation: I want to make my cave safer and cleaner, so that more orcs will want to live here.

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: get rocks from the floor of the cave.

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: put rocks in high ledges and inspect the ceiling of the cave.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: follow the member throughout the cave, as the member points out spots where the cave ceiling needs to be patched.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: wield rocks of all sizes and wedge them into place to stop the rain water from getting in.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: give some rocks to the member and ask them for help.

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: go the cave entrance with the member and admire all the work that has been done.
